Package javelin.model.world.location.unique

Class MercenariesGuild

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.Actor
      • javelin.model.world.location.Location
        • javelin.model.world.location.fortification.Fortification
          • javelin.model.world.location.unique.MercenariesGuild
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class MercenariesGuild
extends Fortification
    The **Mercenaries guild** allows a player to hire mercenaries, which are paid a certain amount in gold per day.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Combatant.mercenary, Serialized Form

      • recruit

        public static boolean recruit​(Combatant combatant,
                              boolean message)
        Pays for the rest of the day and adds to active Squad. If cannot pay warn the user.
        Parameters:
        message - If true and doesn't have enough money will open up a InfoScreen to let the player know. Use false to warn in another manner.
        Returns:
        false if doesn't have enough money to pay in advance.

      • getcombatants

        public java.util.List<Combatant> getcombatants()
        Specified by:
        getcombatants in class Actor
        Returns:
        Any combatants that are situated in this actor, may return null if this is not a valid request for this type of actor. For performance if a List is returned it should be the canonical one, and thus should not be directly modified by the receiver.
        See Also:
        Combatant.newid()
